vote.title: A resolution authorizing (1) the adoption of the Urban Forest Master Plan (UFMP); (2) the coordination of an internal UFMP Staff Task Force to guide implementation of the UFMP; (3) the identification and convening of an UFMP Citywide Task Force formed of a diverse and representative group of external urban forest stakeholders to advise on plan implementation and support regular reporting on the UFMP, and other related issues; and (4) to provide for regular reporting on progress under the UFMP - Financing: This action has no cost consideration to the City (see Fiscal Information) (This item was deferred on May 26, 2021)
